description: Number of numbers which have a "prime-rich" reduced residue system (RRS) and binary order n.
comments: It is remarkable that in exponentially increasing ranges these occurrences increase to n=13 and after decline to zero. So A048868 is believed to be finite.
example: In binary order (A029837) zone of 7 i.e. in [ 63,127) 22 numbers which belong to A048868 can be found: 66,68,70,72,74,76,78,80,84,88, 90,96,98,100,102,104,108,110,112,114,120 and 126. The largest term is 90090. The largest 4 are divided by 2310, the largest 28 by 210 and the largest 103 by 30.
author: _Labos Elemer_
